mapper.insert: insert into table_board (no, title, content, writer, password, regDate) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{password}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update table_board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
update table_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, title, content, writer, password, regDate, hit from table_board where no > 0 order by no desc, regDate desc
